title: T204 Lush T.T.T back Price Reduced!
author: sb1

posts.post_title: T204 Lush T.T.T back Price Reduced!
posts.post_content: Affordable T204 card with the very scarce T.T.T. back. Only found on 1-2% of all T204's. This one is priced to sell due to the obvious back damage, but still a hole filler for the type enthusiast on a budget. No longer available
